channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2024010533
item.description:
Report X-2024010533

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-29T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-16
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A SIDE UNLOAD DOOR 2 FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER WENT TO DOOR 2 UPON ARRIVAL NOTICED HAZMAT PACKAGE ON FLOOR BOTTOM WAS WET FROM LEAKING BATTERY. RESPONDER USED SPILL TRAY AND TRANSPORTED LEAKER TO DMP TO PROCESS.

item.title: Report X-2024010546
item.description:
Report X-2024010546

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-26T15:11:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-17
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: EMPLOYEE WAS UNLOADING HAZMAT 5 PART. HE WAS PICKING IT UP WHEN HE FELT THE CARDBOARD GIVE, HE LOOKED DOWN NOTICED THE CARDBOARD WAS WET. HE GOT A FOUL ODOR AND HELD HIS BREATH PLACED IT ON THE GROUND WALKED OUT OF TRAILER AND NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR SUP CALLED FOR A DMP RESPONDER. RESPONDER WAS IN FULL PPE BROUGHT TO DMP AREA FOR PROCESSING
